title: 空岛无法使用岩浆
author: SJR丶子封
txt_content:
各位
空岛玩家不能使用岩浆怎么办？
ESS也改过了还是无法使用
使用了会出现
您没有权限使用LAVA_BUCKET


求解答 现在很着急！

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 PY狗 于 2019-4-15 00:17 编辑 

打开ess配置文件config.yml
  # For which block types would you like to be alerted?
  # You can find a list of IDs in plugins/Essentials/items.csv after loading Essentials for the first time.
  # 10 = lava :: 11 = still lava :: 46 = TNT :: 327 = lava bucket
  alert:
    on-placement: 10,11,46,327<--这些禁止放置物品ID删掉
    on-use: 327<--这个禁止使用物品ID删掉
    on-break:
